CongressHoldingsResponse.title: CongressHoldingsResponse
CongressHoldingsResponse.description: Json response structure for congress holdings endpoint.

Representative.title: Representative
Representative.description: Name of Congressperson who made the transaction

Amount.title: Amount
Amount.description: Lower bound of transaction size ($). Congressional trades are reported as a range of values, this variable is the lower bound of that range

Party.title: Party
Party.description: Political party of the congressperson who made the trade

TickerType.title: Ticker Type
TickerType.description: Reported type of asset traded. Note: CS and ST are commonly used as abbreviated for common stock

ExcessReturn.title: Excess Return
ExcessReturn.description: Estimated return of stock compared to return of S&P 500 since the transaction date

PriceChange.title: Price Change
PriceChange.description: Percentage change in stock price since the transaction date

SPYChange.title: SPY Change
SPYChange.description: Percentage change in S&P 500 since the transaction date

last_modified.title: Last Modified
last_modified.description: Date that Quiver last updated the details of this transaction

TickerType.title: Tickertype
TickerType.description: Reported type of asset traded. Note: CS and ST are commonly used as abbreviated for common stock

Trade_Size_USD.title: Trade Size Usd
Trade_Size_USD.description: Lower bound of transaction size ($). Congressional trades are reported as a range of values, this variable is the lower bound of that range

Name.title: Name
Name.description: Name of congressperson who made the transaction

Party.title: Party
Party.description: Party of the congressperson who made the transaction

District.title: District
District.description: District of the congressperson who made the transaction

excess_return.title: Excess Return
excess_return.description: Estimated return of stock compared to return of S&P 500 since the transaction date

uploaded.title: Quiver_Upload_Time
uploaded.description: Time that transaction was scraped and processed by Quiver

last_modified.title: Last Modified
last_modified.description: Date that Quiver last updated the details of this transaction

TrumpBeta.title: Trumpbeta
TrumpBeta.description: Correlation between daily % change in Trump's election odds and daily % change in company's stock price. Companies with a higher Trump Beta are expected to do better in the event of a Trump re-election, companies with a lower Trump Beta are expected to better if Biden is elected.

TrumpOdds.title: Trumpodds
TrumpOdds.description: Trump's re-election odds on this date (derived from PredictIt betting market)

HistoricalPoliticalBetaResponse.title: HistoricalPoliticalBetaResponse
HistoricalPoliticalBetaResponse.description: JSON Response structure for historical political beta endpoint.

Mentions.title: Mentions
Mentions.description: Number of mentions on the date's r/SPACs Daily Discussion thread

Rank.title: Rank
Rank.description: This SPAC's rank on the given date (as determined by total number of mentions)

Sentiment.title: Sentiment
Sentiment.description: Average sentiment of all comments containing the given ticker on this date. Sentiment is calculated using VADER sentiment analysis.

TrumpBeta.title: Trumpbeta
TrumpBeta.description: Correlation between daily % change in Trump's election odds and daily % change in company's stock price. Companies with a higher Trump Beta are expected to do better in the event of a Trump re-election, companies with a lower Trump Beta are expected to better if Biden is elected.
